name: Alternative Facts (itch)
description:
See if you can figure out whats "Fact" and what "Alternative Fact". Simply read the quote or statement and make your selection. How many can you identify correctly in each category. Remember, somebody said it, So it must be true! right.....?

Categories Include
  • Pollitcal Statements
  • Math Formulas
  • Movie Quotes
Version History

0.32

  • Basic game engine for demoing and comment
  • Three categories so far
  • 30 second window
  • Looking for feedback
  • Android and iOS planned for
